text: Susan Gilmore was born 24 November, 1954 in London. She is a British actress who played Elizabeth Fitt in BBC drama series Angels and Avril Rolfe in Howards' Way. She has also guest starred in Never the Twain, The Bill, Casualty and Holby City. She was married to British rower Daniel Topolski and had three children. She is not related to British actor Peter Gilmore. Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:British television actors
title: Susan Gilmore
